steps.title: Minor Arcana cards speak to different aspects of your daily life.
steps.content: Minor Arcana cards speak to different aspects of your daily life. While Major Arcana tarot cards (e.g., The Empress, The Fool , The Lovers, etc.) represent the major, big-picture elements of your life, their Minor Arcana tarot counterparts really zoom in and focus on the details, feelings, and struggles of your day-to-day existence. In a typical tarot deck, there are 56 Minor Arcana cards in total. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Minor Arcana cards are divided into four 14-card suits.
steps.content: Minor Arcana cards are divided into four 14-card suits. Like a deck of playing cards, the 56 Minor Arcana cards all fall into different suits. These suits aren’t the standard Hearts, Clubs, Spades, and Diamonds, though—rather, they’re Wands, Cups, Pentacles, and Swords. Each suit relates to specific themes that apply to your day-to-day life and routine. [2] X Research source Wands: Wands are connected to the element of fire and represent confidence, energy, and adventurousness. In a reading, the Suit of Wands speaks to themes of movement and imagination in your life. Cups: Cups are associated with the element of water and represent your relationships and emotions. In a reading, the Suit of Cups relates to themes of spirituality and feelings. Pentacles: Pentacles are attributed to the element of earth and signify nature, physical experiences, and money. In a reading, the Suit of Pentacles speaks to themes of your material goods and finances. Swords: Swords are associated with the element of fire and symbolize ethics, truthfulness, and fairness. In a reading, the Suit of Swords speaks to themes of intelligence, reason, and negative states of mind.

steps.title: Each card rank carries a specific meaning.
steps.content: Each card rank carries a specific meaning. All Minor Arcana suits contain an Ace, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, Page, Knight, Queen, and King. Throughout all of these suits, each card type relates to a specific sort of theme or lesson in your life. [3] X Research source Ace: Beginnings and new potential 2: Balance; two halves coming together 3: The way a group works together; completion 4: Growth and advancing forward 5: Change; conflict 6: Harmony; finding solutions 7: Self-reflection; introspection 8: Achievement; growth 9: Transition; feeling almost complete 10: Completion; continuing onward Page: New opportunities and beginnings Knight: Movement and forging ahead Queen: Femininity; looking to wise individuals for guidance King: Power; the need for self-belief

steps.title: Ace of Wands
steps.content: Ace of Wands The Ace of Wands symbolizes the importance of both taking the initiative and taking the first step forward with an idea or project that you have in mind. Keywords: Creativity, passion, inspiration Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries , Leo , Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 2 of Wands
steps.content: 2 of Wands The Two of Wands revolves around the concept of decision-making—it especially stresses the importance of taking a leap of faith and exploring new horizons. Keywords: Goal-setting, risk-taking, planning Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 3 of Wands
steps.content: 3 of Wands The Three of Wands centers around the theme of traveling and taking steps to reach your potential. Keywords: Confidence, growth, expansion Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 4 of Wands
steps.content: 4 of Wands The Four of Wands revolves around the concepts of stability and fellowship with your loved ones and friends. Keywords: Home, parties, belonging Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 5 of Wands
steps.content: 5 of Wands The Five of Wands points to some sort of issue, competition, or conflict that’s currently bothering you or will soon make itself known. Keywords: Tension, arguments, rivals Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 6 of Wands
steps.content: 6 of Wands The Six of Wands acknowledges a recent success you’ve reached thanks to your personal capabilities. Keywords: Victory, rewards, recognition Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 7 of Wands
steps.content: 7 of Wands The Seven of Wands urges you to stay true to your principles and goals, even if you’re in a difficult spot—you may need to be on the lookout for people trying to supersede you. Keywords: Defending yourself, defending your territory, protectiveness Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 8 of Wands
steps.content: 8 of Wands The Eight of Wands signifies that your past troubles (the ones connected with the Seven of Wands) are gone and that you may be charting a new, exciting course for yourself in the future. Keywords: Movement, excitement, sudden changes Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 9 of Wands
steps.content: 9 of Wands The Nine of Wands reminds you of the difficulties you’ve conquered in the past and urges you to keep a positive and empowered attitude as you face future obstacles. Keywords: Persistence, resilience, grit Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 10 of Wands
steps.content: 10 of Wands The Ten of Wands reminds you to seek balance and moderation in your life rather than expecting too much from yourself at once. Keywords: Burden, responsibility, burnout Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: Page of Wands
steps.content: Page of Wands The Page of Wands symbolizes your energetic desire to put yourself out there, but it also warns you to not get too distracted or unmotivated in the process. Keywords: Adventurousness, fearlessness, cheerfulness Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Knight of Wands
steps.content: Knight of Wands The Knight of Wands encourages you to get out, seek adventure, and accomplish what you’re setting out to do. Keywords: Charming, free-spirited, energetic Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Queen of Wands
steps.content: Queen of Wands The Queen of Wands speaks to the immense focus and drive you have in your life right now, along with the positive, inspiring, and occasionally self-focused energy you carry. Keywords: Self-assured, passionate, vivacious Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: King of Wands
steps.content: King of Wands The King of Wands symbolizes the eager desire you have to face and conquer whatever challenges may come your way, as you find problem-solving to be really satisfying. [4] X Research source Keywords: Element: Fire Zodiac signs: Aries, Leo, Sagittarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Ace of Cups
steps.content: Ace of Cups The Ace of Cups urges you to release any negative emotional vibes you’re carrying and live a fulfilling, unburdened life. Keywords: Spirituality, new feelings, intuition Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer , Scorpio , Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 2 of Cups
steps.content: 2 of Cups The Two of Cups highlights the power of being part of a pair and joining forces with someone else. Keywords: Partnership, close bonds, unity Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 3 of Cups
steps.content: 3 of Cups The Three of Cups signifies happy moments spent with your friends and spells out a future celebration or reunion in your future. Keywords: Community, group events, friendship Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 4 of Cups
steps.content: 4 of Cups The Four of Cups encourages you to take a careful inventory of your attitude to help you get through a rough, discouraging patch in your life. Keywords: Contemplation, apathy, discontent Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 5 of Cups
steps.content: 5 of Cups The Five of Cups notes that you might be overly focused on something negative that happened in the past, and the disappointment you feel that certain events didn’t play out the way you wanted them to. Keywords: Sadness, loss, grief Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 6 of Cups
steps.content: 6 of Cups The Six of Cups represents a sense of nostalgia you might be feeling, including a desire to return to the carefree days of your childhood. Keywords: Memories, sentimentality, healing Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 7 of Cups
steps.content: 7 of Cups The Seven of Cups reminds you to be mindful of the consequences that come with your goals and dreams, along with the importance of taking active steps to achieve your desires. Keywords: Illusion, indecision, wishful thinking Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 8 of Cups
steps.content: 8 of Cups The Eight of Cups highlights a need to step away from something in your life in order to transition and transform into something better. Keywords: Abandonment, searching for truth, letting go Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 9 of Cups
steps.content: 9 of Cups The Nine of Cups indicates that you’ve reached a point of personal happiness, and that, after a fair amount of struggling, you’ve reached exactly what you’re looking for. Keywords: Wish fulfillment, satisfaction, pleasure Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 10 of Cups
steps.content: 10 of Cups The Ten of Cups encompasses feelings of jubilance, peace, and contentment within your romantic or familial relationships. Keywords: Happiness, emotional stability, domestic harmony Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Page of Cups
steps.content: Page of Cups The Page of Cups highlights the importance of being open-minded and accepting of new ideas that sail into your orbit, especially ones that come from your gut. Keywords: Idealism, sensitivity, dreamer Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Knight of Cups
steps.content: Knight of Cups The Knight of Cups signifies something that’s upcoming in your life: a person or event that will provide you with some type of emotional advantage. Keywords: Charming, idealist, grateful Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Queen of Cups
steps.content: Queen of Cups The Queen of Cups reminds you to prioritize your own emotional and mental well-being and to not set yourself on fire to keep others warm. Keywords: Intuition, kindness, compassion Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: King of Cups
steps.content: King of Cups The King of Cups highlights the importance of striking a healthy balance with your thoughts and feelings, and how doing so can help you learn more about yourself. [5] X Research source Keywords: Diplomatic, devoted, wise Element: Water Zodiac signs: Cancer, Scorpio, Pisces Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Ace of Pentacles
steps.content: Ace of Pentacles The Ace of Pentacles hints that stability and prosperity are on the horizon as long as you pay attention to the new opportunities that are heading in your direction. Keywords: New opportunities, abundance, manifestation Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 2 of Pentacles
steps.content: 2 of Pentacles The Two of Pentacles hints that you might be putting a lot of time and energy into balancing separate elements of your life—it might help to distance yourself to get a better point of view. Keywords: Adaptation, flexibility, balancing resources Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 3 of Pentacles
steps.content: 3 of Pentacles The Three of Pentacles indicates that success is on you and your team’s horizon and that all the pieces are in place to reach the goals you’re hoping to reach. Keywords: Teamwork, collaboration, shared goals Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 4 of Pentacles
steps.content: 4 of Pentacles The Four of Pentacles acknowledges the success that you’ve reached but also warns of becoming too greedy in order to hold onto this success. Keywords: Security, stinginess, insecurity Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 5 of Pentacles
steps.content: 5 of Pentacles The Five of Pentacles points to difficult times in your future, such as a period of loneliness, low income, or sickness/disease. Keywords: Hardship, alienation, adversity Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 6 of Pentacles
steps.content: 6 of Pentacles The Six of Pentacles indicates that you’ve reached a comfortable balance in your current income and that you’re able to comfortably share your resources with others. Keywords: Charity, generosity, gratitude Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 7 of Pentacles
steps.content: 7 of Pentacles The Seven of Pentacles indicates that your financial difficulties are coming to an end and that the efforts you’ve put into your financial status are benefitting you in the long run. Keywords: Results, rewards, harvest Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 8 of Pentacles
steps.content: 8 of Pentacles The Eight of Pentacles stresses the importance of putting a lot of effort and energy into your goals in order to achieve the high results you want. Keywords: Craftsmanship, high standards, expertise Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 9 of Pentacles
steps.content: 9 of Pentacles The Nine of Pentacles indicates that you’re feeling accomplished, capable, and ready to treat yourself. Keywords: Success, achievement, independence Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 10 of Pentacles
steps.content: 10 of Pentacles The Ten of Pentacles reminds you that your personal investments will pay off, and that, with your careful perspective and work ethic, you’ll find success. Keywords: Legacy, inheritance, affluence Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Page of Pentacles
steps.content: Page of Pentacles The Page of Pentacles highlights the importance of having a determined work ethic and staying focused (as well as asking for help if you need it). Keywords: Diligent, consistent, studious Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Knight of Pentacles
steps.content: Knight of Pentacles The Knight of Pentacles points to the importance of being dependable and trustworthy, and that your current sense of commitment and loyalty allows you to check all the items off your task list. Keywords: Patient, efficient, practical Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Queen of Pentacles
steps.content: Queen of Pentacles The Queen of Pentacles offers multi-faceted support and guidance as you strive to achieve your dreams—besides affection, she encourages you to be cautious and financially sound. Keywords: Caring, nurturing, business savvy Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: King of Pentacles
steps.content: King of Pentacles The King of Pentacles encourages you to properly manage your time and money as you seek to achieve your dreams. [6] X Research source Keywords: Prosperity, safe, protective Element: Earth Zodiac signs: Taurus, Virgo, Capricorn Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Ace of Swords
steps.content: Ace of Swords The Ace of Swords signals that you’re about to encounter an important moment where you can see your life from a new perspective. Keywords: Clarity, vision, truth Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini , Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 2 of Swords
steps.content: 2 of Swords The Two of Swords indicates that you might be in an uncomfortable position where you have to make a difficult decision between two different paths. Keywords: Stalemate, denial, stuck in the middle Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 3 of Swords
steps.content: 3 of Swords The Three of Swords indicates that a deep hurt or betrayal may be in your future—if you plan for it ahead of time, it might not be quite as painful. Keywords: Separation, sadness, loss Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 4 of Swords
steps.content: 4 of Swords The Four of Swords stresses the importance of taking time to step back, rest, and rejuvenate your spirit after a hurtful and/or exhausting circumstance. Keywords: Peace, recuperation, sanctuary Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 5 of Swords
steps.content: 5 of Swords The Five of Swords points to a current conflict you’re experiencing in your life or a disagreement that’s leading to plenty of negative vibes. Keywords: Aggression, hostility, intimidation Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 6 of Swords
steps.content: 6 of Swords The Six of Swords indicates that change and transition are occurring in your life—but you aren’t feeling that happy about it. Keywords: Accepting lessons, departure, moving on Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: 7 of Swords
steps.content: 7 of Swords The Seven of Swords warns that a certain person in your orbit (be it yourself or somebody else) is struggling to deceive and be sneaky. Keywords: Scheming, lies, cunning Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 8 of Swords
steps.content: 8 of Swords The Eight of Swords highlights a difficult time in your life when you’re feeling corned; because of your negatively altered mindset, it’s not a great time to make big choices for yourself. Keywords: Helpless, imprisoned, victimized Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 9 of Swords
steps.content: 9 of Swords The Nine of Swords highlights a struggle or trauma you might be juggling and the importance of sharing your difficulties with others. Keywords: Negativity, anxiety, isolation Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: 10 of Swords
steps.content: 10 of Swords The Ten of Swords warns that a serious problem or crisis is headed in your direction and that it might not even be on your radar. Keywords: Failure, exhaustion, ruin Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? No

steps.title: Page of Swords
steps.content: Page of Swords The Page of Swords affirms that you’re feeling energized and excited about a new idea that’s bustling around in your mind and that it’s important to tell your ideas to other people. Keywords: Communicative, curious, inspired Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Knight of Swords
steps.content: Knight of Swords The Knight of Swords acknowledges the grit and perseverance you have when approaching life’s tasks and challenges, but it also warns you to not let your tenacity keep you ignorant of any possible ramifications. Keywords: Impatient, focused, ambitious Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: Queen of Swords
steps.content: Queen of Swords The Queen of Swords encourages you to take a more practical and rational approach to making decisions rather than leaning on your emotions alone. Keywords: Independent, principled, objective Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes

steps.title: King of Swords
steps.content: King of Swords The King of Swords highlights the importance of being observant and objective in your day-to-day life, along with the importance of using your intelligence to assert yourself. [7] X Research source Keywords: Integrity, discipline, strict Element: Air Zodiac signs: Gemini, Libra, Aquarius Does it mean yes or no in a reading? Yes
